text: ha' vahe'zmimofo mopafima manine'za maka antahintahi zamireti'ene, tumozmireti'ene, zamagu'areti'enema hu'za kumi zamigu'ma zamasunku'ma nehu'za, tagehe'ima zami'nana moparegane, huhampri zmante'nana rankumategane, mono hunegante'za kagi erisga hihoma hu'nama kintoa nonteganema zamavugosa hunte'ne'za nunamuma hanagenka,
